isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - CATERPILLAR C-10, C-12 AND 3406E ENGINES - OPERATION - Vehicle Speed Sensor

svcproc.title: Vehicle Speed Sensor
svcproc.para: The ECM receives the AC signal from the vehicle speed sensor (1099) on circuits 97AJ and 97AK, through connector (1093), and sends a signal to the vehicle speedometer. The ECM also sends the signal to drive the vehicle tachometer.
Two types of sensors are available. The threaded (adjustable) sensor is used on most transmissions.
A push-in (non-adjustable) sensor may be used on some transmissions.
